description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国人民解放军少将。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and a major general in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海南省的省会，张德仁的出生地。
description.en: The capital of Hainan Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Zhang Deren.

en: Hunan Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖南省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Hunan Province.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军湖南省军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军湖南省军区
en: Hunan Provincial Military District of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在湖南省设立的军事组织。
description.en: The military organization established by the People's Liberation Army in Hunan Province.

en: Major General of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的将官军衔之一。
description.en: One of the general officer ranks of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 张德仁出生于广东海口（今属海南省）。
description.en: Zhang Deren was born in Haikou, Guangdong (now part of Hainan Province).

description.zh-cn: 张德仁曾任中共湖南省委常委。
description.en: Zhang Deren once served as a member of the Standing Committee of the CCP Hunan Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军湖南省军区

description.zh-cn: 张德仁曾任中国人民解放军湖南省军区司令员。
description.en: Zhang Deren once served as the Commander of the PLA Hunan Military District.

description.zh-cn: 张德仁拥有中国人民解放军少将军衔。
description.en: Zhang Deren held the rank of Major General in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，张德仁是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the Wikipedia category, Zhang Deren is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.
